thread.title: Bernard Kumordzi unveils acquisition of high-performing luxury Mercedes Benz car
thread.title_full: Bernard Kumordzi unveils acquisition of high-performing luxury Mercedes Benz car

title: Bernard Kumordzi unveils acquisition of high-performing luxury Mercedes Benz car
text:
14:25 CET Bernard Kumordzi unveils acquisition of high-performing luxury Mercedes Benz car - www.ghanasoccernet.com 
Ghana midfielder Bernard Kumordzi has revealed the acquisition of the sleek Mercedes Benz CLS 63 AMG automobile worth over a $100,000. 
The 30-year-old who is still recovering from injury posted a picture of his 'New Babi' on his Instagram page. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
